https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/agI4S316J2ffQY9tOndy9DLTqa2.jpg Pointing out the importance of maintaining a playful spirit, which we all have when we are kids and society forces us to abandon in our adult lives, Drops of Joy is a documentary that speaks widely about the idea that playing is something very serious and urgent. Drops of Joy
